definition: surname You
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
scallops along lower edge of flag
swimming/to swim
upper reaches (of a river)/upper level/upper echelon/upstream
lower reaches (of a river)/lower level/lower echelon/downstream
swimming pool/CL:場|场[chang3]
floating capital/idle fund/hot money
the middle stretches of a river/middle level/middle echelon/midstream
guerrilla warfare
swimming pool
variant of 周遊|周游, to tour/to travel around
to move about/to go from place to place/roving/mobile
to fight as a guerilla/(fig.) to live or eat at no fixed place
to float/to drift/to wander/variant of 蜉蝣[fu2 you2]
to go on a mental journey
to wander/to shift around/to waver/to vacillate

sentences.english: The race started at one side of a river and all the animals had to swim to the other side.
sentences.chinese: 比賽始於河的一畔，而所有的動物都必須游到對岸。

sentences.english: Remaining in the deep water for a while, she begins to kick her way up towards the surface.
sentences.chinese: 她在深水中逗留片刻之後開始踢打着水向水面游去。

sentences.english: 16-18 He came to the surface, swam to shore, and went back to the villa to wait for his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他浮上了水面，游到海邊，回到別墅裏等媽媽。

sentences.english: With the water's tow, they'd never get to him in time.
sentences.chinese: 由於水的拉拽，他們根本不可能及時游到小男孩身邊。

sentences.english: He made history by be the first man to swim from England to France.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一個從英國游到法國的，因而名垂史冊。

sentences.english: They're heading for south eastern Alaska.
sentences.chinese: 它們正朝着南阿拉斯加游去。

sentences.english: He spent three days to swim to the shore.
sentences.chinese: 他花了三天時間游到海岸。

sentences.english: They had just had enough time to swim out of danger when the boat again completed a circle.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛剛來得及游出危險區，快艇就又轉完了一圈。

sentences.english: After swimming, I find that I have a voracious appetite.
sentences.chinese: 游完泳後，我發現我的食慾大增。

sentences.english: I came near being drowned in the attempt to swim across.
sentences.chinese: 我在試圖游到對岸去時差一點被淹死。

sentences.english: You cannot afford to relax your vigilance for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 游完泳後你願意放鬆一下嗎？

sentences.english: I took a deep breath, closely followed the dive guide, toward the distance to swim.
sentences.chinese: 我深吸了一口氣，緊緊跟隨着潛導，向着遠處游去。

sentences.english: The eel slithered in and out of the sunken ship.
sentences.chinese: 這條鰻魚在這艘沉船裏遊進游出。

sentences.english: Feeling safe, the tourist started swimming leisurely toward the shore.
sentences.chinese: 感到安全之後，那位遊客開始放鬆地朝岸邊游去。

sentences.english: He understood that he must swim down to the base of the rock from the surface of the water.
sentences.chinese: 他明白了，他必須從水面游到岩石的最下邊。

sentences.english: The green and white star ferry to the island to swim slowly.
sentences.chinese: 綠白兩色的天星小輪緩緩向港島游去。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
outing/short trip
trip/journey/tourism/travel/tour/to travel
to go boating
to search for ancient relics
to go to some place at night/to take a night trip to (a place)/to sleepwalk
to seek unusual scenery or places
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
to travel around/to roam/(mobile telephony) roaming
to fly
Taoyuan county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan/Taoyuan township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
see 桃花源[tao2 hua1 yuan2]
to row a boat
to visit scenic spots
free/unrestrained/to inundate
well-known scenic spot
lasting for ages/long drawn out/remote in time or space/unhurried/a great number (of events)/preposterous/pensive
